ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Wrong, usually speaking a kill stealer has to stay within the levels he is and the others who are hunting the same place. A 12th level Wiz may be able to
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> One wiz can do enough damage to a mob that the total gropu can not make
> up for. Your idea, in theory makes sense, however, it would not
> correct the situation.

Wrong, usually speaking a kill stealer has to stay within the levels he is
and the others who are hunting the same place. A 12th level Wiz may be able
to steal kill from a 15 level Magician ALONE - BUT he cannot get off enough
spells to make up for a group total nor would he have the mana to do such a
thing blasting his high mana spells off.

Our 4 person group on one round can do about 500 damage with spells not
counting pets and melee. No lone Wiz can compete with that unless he is
*very* high level above us and that is usually not the case. Usually the
kill stealer wants to get off that one shot of a large damage spell so they
get the kill but take no risk. Usually at that point if everyone stops
attacking and backs away towards the KS - and then politely say how very
sorry you are, and here you can have it :) makes them go away very soon :)
